channel.title: CVE Feed for Google Inc. -- Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Google Inc. -- Android

item.title: CVE-2018-9509|2024-09-17T00:06:57.043Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In smp_proc_master_id of smp_act.cc, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote information disclosure over Bluetooth with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android Versions: Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9.0 Android ID: A-111937027

item.title: CVE-2017-13247|2024-09-17T00:06:03.165Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In the Pixel 2 bootloader, there is a missing permission check which bypasses carrier bootloader lock. This could lead to local elevation of privileges with user execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID: A-71486645.

item.title: CVE-2018-9358|2024-09-17T00:06:26.656Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In gatts_process_attribute_req of gatt_sc.cc, there is a possible read of uninitialized data due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote information disclosure in the Bluetooth process with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android Versions: Android-6.0 Android-6.0.1 Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android ID: A-73172115.

item.title: CVE-2017-0692|2024-09-17T00:06:56.567Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability in the Android media framework. Product: Android. Versions: 4.4.4, 5.0.2, 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2. Android ID: A-36725407.
